dialogue.line: brah
i walked all the way here
just for this??
like who the hell is this?
brah who are YOU to be saying that breh
ok man. i'll tell you
the name's philip; that one guy who saved a school remember...
now can you let me in your house? please? nancy won't stop telling me to ask someone to let them in their house
sweetie... why did you have to say that !!!! now i will look weird !!!!
don't Fucking. call me that . ok
please just let me in so this bitch shuts up god DAMN
no bro
that's MY house... me... betpo's house... i only let people in when i want to
and i Don't want you To
grrr !!!
please... stick guy... *sniff* pls.... let my pookie have his way...
ugh.
can youshut The up man i ain't giving you all that
WAITWAITWAIT!! IDEA!!!
rap battle!
dude
if philly wins he gets to enter ur house !!! pls... it would be so fun...
i'm only gonna agree just so that you shut up about all of this. you are an annoying fuck
i despise you with all my being and i pray on your downfall
nah man
whatever. i've got bars up my sleeve and i'll demolish you with them... heh
that's my boy!!!
SHUT. THE FUCK UP
nah. that's just not it bruj

you've got 0 bar.
i know bro. i know it. you have no bars. 0 bars. -1 bars even. impossible but it's true
here, i'll show you real bars, just watch:
